record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, FEBRUARY 4, 2008, AT 2 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, FEBRUARY 4, 2008, AT 2 P.M. -- (Senate - January 31, 2008)

[Page: S559]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:20 p.m., adjourned until Monday, February 4, 2008, at 2 p.m.
